column2: # Here, plot a line graph showing the trend of DALY burden for the chosen countries over time. You can use ggplot2 to create this plot. Each country's line should be a different color.
ggplot(data = DALY,  mapping = aes(y = dal_ys_disability_adjusted_life_years_all_causes_sex_both_age_age_standardized_rate, x =  year, group = entity, colour = entity))+
